#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <stack>
#define TRUE 1
#define FALSE 2
#define MOD 1000
#define sd(x,y) scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&y) ;
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x) ;
#define rep(i,a,n) for(int i = a ; i<=n ; i++)
#define tc() int t ; scanf("%d",&t) ; while(t--)
#define all(c) c.begin() , c.end()
#define ALL(c) c.rbegin() , c.rend()
#define present(container, element) (container.find(element) != container.end())
#define cpresent(container, element) (find(all(container),element) != container.end())
#define tr(container, it) for(typeof(container.begin()) it = container.begin(); it != container.end(); it++)
using namespace std ;
typedef int L ;
typedef long long int LL ;
typedef pair< int , int > PII ;
typedef pair< PII , int > PIII ;
 
L main()
{
    while(1)
    {
        LL x , y ;
        sd(x,y)
        if(x==0&&y==0)break;
        LL count = 0  , sum = 0 , x1 , y1 ;
        while(x!=0 && y!=0)
        {
        	x1 = x%10 ;
        	y1 = y%10 ;
        	sum = x1 + y1 ;
        	x = x/10 ;
        	y = y/10 ;
        	if(sum>=10) count+=1;
        	sum = 0 ;
        }
        if(count==1)printf("%lld carry operation.\n",count);
        if(count>1)printf("%lld carry operations.\n",count);
        if(count==0)printf("No carry operation.\n") ;
    }
	return 0 ;
}
